website_summaries.verdict: A beginner-friendly airbrush that arrives in an attractive and  well-packaged kit.
pros: Longtime USA brand maintains strong reviews for its design and capability
Great for basic spraying jobs such as solid coats, uniform lines, or stencil work

customer_reviews.title: Great Airbrush But Misleading Ad - Pieces not included
customer_reviews.text: Great airbrush, especially for the money... HOWEVER... as other have said... the ad is misleading... it says you get "all 3 head sizes"... when you actually get only the #1 & #5 needles and air tips... and you get all 3 size paint tips... Where are my #3 needle and #3 air tip!!?. Also, the picture shows glass jars... and they cheapened the set yet again, by giving me plastic jars. I would have paid a few more dollars, for a full set.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cerakote!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used it once, I’ve never used an airbrush prior to this and it was really easy to handle. I purposely tried to make the paint run on a piece of cardboard to see how My strokes need to be and you pretty much have to hold it on one spot to ruin something so I just went to town. Cerakoted a handguard, upper and lower receiver no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Munch

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I received my order on time. However, there was no information about needing adapter fittings along with the airbrush gun. So I can not rate anything about it because I am not able to use it until the adapters are delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I’m not an airbrush guru. I don’t do any magic things with them. I use them for detail painting on automotive paint repairs. That being said, this is a very high quality airbrush. I had a Badger 350, which by comparison is a POS to the Paasche. This is a precision piece of equipment, which works flawlessly and cleans up nicely. I love it and am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. K.

customer_reviews.title: Very good airbrush.
customer_reviews.text: I was having trouble painting my trout carving. I have to use acrylic airbrush paints, as I have no exhaust system for lacquer paints. Nozzle clogging was a significant problem with my other airbrush. I ordered this one as a backup, and will use it from now on. The one minor thing, which caused the 4 rather than 5 star rating, was that the #1 nozzle (the fine one) didn't have the needle. I had to order a separate #1 nozzle and needle set, so I ended up paying the same amount I would have spent for a new airbrush, instead of saving money buying this one "used in good condition. It was in good condition, it just wasn't complete.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Collier

customer_reviews.title: This is not the best one out there but for the price it is ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not the best one out there but for the price it is pretty good deal. I use it for spraying one color over detailed aluminum and it does this job perfect. I am in no way a pro but this does the job great, no clogs and I clean it thoroughly after each use.
customer_reviews.author: My2Cents

customer_reviews.title: perfect for Duracoat
customer_reviews.text: I used this to Duracoat a couple rifles. If you are using Duracoat and looking for an airbrush, buy this one. It worked flawlessly and everything came out perfect. First time airbrushing, as well!!
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Best Little Airbrush!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this airbrush for 2 years now for my business and it works like a champ every single time! Keep it clean and it will keep you happy!
customer_reviews.author: Shane Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Great Airbrush
customer_reviews.text: I use this primarily to touch up stain on picture frames that I make. It allows me to get into the cracks and crevices easily. Cleanup is a breeze and one of the main reasons I selected this airbrush. I'm spraying primarily a water based stain so for cleanup I cap the paint bottle and flush out the needle valve. Could't be easier. Very happy with the quality and performance of this airbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Kerryks1

customer_reviews.title: Missing threads from hose connection nut.
customer_reviews.text: The nut-end of the included hose does not have threads. Seems like a factory defect to me. If I’m wrong, I’d love to hear an explanation.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Olinger

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and adjustment. Simple to adjust. Only drawback is the plastic bottles that are supplied with air brush. The lids do not seal very well, and they are prone to leak. Would have given 5 stars if not for the leakage. I would prefer glass bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Willy

customer_reviews.title: The air brush gun is nice feels well good in the hand
customer_reviews.text: The air brush gun is nice feels well good in the hand. The paint containers are cheap plastic and they leak so dont shake the paint in them or you will have it all over the place. The rest feels of good material. Im happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ShopAholicsUnited

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, easy to adjust and handle. The lid leaks a bit, will modify to stop that
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: My old airbrush was on its last legs so, I bought this one for a very good price. I wasn't disappointed. Very good quality and should last me a long time. It arrived quickly and in pristine condition. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fred J.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for what I do. Only one small flaw.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first airbrush ever and was recommended by a friend. I love it. I paint small wood pieces and stencils and this works perfectly for that. The only issue is that the larger bottle will not fit onto the airbrush. Either the air hose connection is too close or the angle of the metal spout is wrong, but it physically impossible to connect. Aside from that, I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kozak

customer_reviews.title: Good brush for model cars, not so much for miniatures
customer_reviews.text: A decent brush for painting model cars and using enamel paints. The single action nature is not as forgiving when trying to paint miniature figures as well as acrylic paint easily clogs the nozzles on this brush.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I like this airbrush
customer_reviews.text: I like this airbrush. Much better than the Badger Air-Brush Company 350. The quality is so much better. My only problem with it was the tube that goes inside the jar disintegrated and fell off halfway between the jar. Very strange. It would be great if there were a few additional replacement tubes that came with.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky65

customer_reviews.title: Flawless
customer_reviews.text: Awesome airbrush. I use for gun coating and has been a dream to use
customer_reviews.author: Stopher

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing airbrush, only down side is mine is missing the nut that holds needle in place...
customer_reviews.author: Bijan Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: great little unit
customer_reviews.text: Ease of use from fine lines to larger area coverage i use it for detailing guitars i build
customer_reviews.author: C. Mac Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Great but
customer_reviews.text: I asked a model train group what airbrush to get 8/10 said Paasche..easy to clean and works great..
customer_reviews.author: JollyRodger

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is not the best air brush on the market but for the money it works great. I used it to spray duracoat on a few different projects and it worked great. Just make sure you clean it well after use and it will easily get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: morgan barton

customer_reviews.title: Very functional piece of equipment; lousy add-ons
customer_reviews.text: It would be helpful to know that Paasche has their own proprietary air-hose fittings. It's not like you can run out to the local convenience store to get batteries. Now, I have to wait an additional 7-10 days for something to get here that would not cost you much to include.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W.

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use single action airbrush.
customer_reviews.text: Great choice for easy to use and clean airbrush for custom painting walleye blades and crankbaits. This kit comes with everything you need.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lux

customer_reviews.title: Great airbrush
customer_reviews.text: Great unit. I bought this one because I lost my other one!
customer_reviews.author: Buffalobwana

customer_reviews.title: worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Build is great, Quality is great, much better than i expected, Easy to use for first timer like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Sprays paint with great results
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I wish the different nozzles were labeled as to size but oh well. The kit is solid, sprays well, and is a welcome addition to my modeling toolkit.
customer_reviews.author: Chacho

customer_reviews.title: Old Dog - Old Tricks
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Paasche H brushes exclusively for over 40 years. Tried others and always come back. Over the years I taught myself how to adjust the flow while spraying so for me it's more ergonomic than a double action. Your results may vary!
customer_reviews.author: Glen R. Senkowski

customer_reviews.title: Great for what I use this airbrush for.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for large area paint jobs like model car bodies, not for detail work. I use my Talon airbrush for detail work.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Immen

customer_reviews.title: Great airbrush
customer_reviews.text: This is a great all around airbrush. It works well for detail work, and bigger pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Paasche is a terrible brand to buy. Breaks easily without even any damage to it.
customer_reviews.text: What garbage! I will NEVER buy this brand again. It broke apart on me while using it on my second painting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PART MISSING
customer_reviews.text: THIS AIR BRUSH SET IS MISSING PART #F-186 THE WRENCH
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Great single action airbrush. Easy to use, my workhorse for scale model painting.
customer_reviews.author: Jacapo

customer_reviews.title: nice airbrush!!
customer_reviews.text: used this for face painting. not very good for detail work but for stencils and base coats and shades and some not so small detail it works great. best thing about it is............CLEANING!!! this is the fastest and easiest airbrush to clean that i know of. runs any kind of paint.
customer_reviews.author: Frank.e

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It was bought as a tool for my large areas to paint but might become my go to airbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Passion for Paasche
customer_reviews.text: I’m an artist and have previously used PAASCHE, AN AWESOME PRODUCT AND BRAND OF AIRBRUSH
customer_reviews.author: Timoti Pekamu

customer_reviews.title: Good airbrush
customer_reviews.text: I've used this airbrush heavily building a model train layout. It has had zero issues, is easy to clean, and not overly picky about paint. If your looking for a good hobbyist airbrush, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: The Ritchies

customer_reviews.title: Second H set purchase
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my 30 year old Paasche that has served me well. Too many drops and knocks dictated a new airbrush
customer_reviews.author: RCM

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Received this quickly, BUT when opened the accessories were incomplete. Should have shipped with three different tip sizes. Received two of one size tip (.45 mm) and one tip of the medium size (.65 mm), missing the 1.06mm tip, which is the one I needed. This was fullfilled from a subcontractor so could not return to amazon for a replacement, only a credit. Not much help there, needed this to meet a deadline, ended up purchasing the missing tip on line from another supplier, removing any savings utilizing amazon. Historically Amazon has been good about replacements, but now learned a new lesson, subcontracted suppliers are not part of the replacement model. I will be more vigilant in my future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Boomer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BRUSH
customer_reviews.text: WoooooW...this the best airbrush i've used it for what i need...it's working great with a lot o paint type....easy to clean. 10 STARS :) i think i'll buy the other models from Paasche, the ones with double action...thank you.
customer_reviews.author: IOAN P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with single action airbrush, it is very easy to use and it Doesn't require artistic skills to use.
customer_reviews.author: Diegoboy

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate information
customer_reviews.text: Missing some pieces that were in orginal listing, also cups are plastic not glass like shown. Not happy for inaccurate description!
customer_reviews.author: Shayle Helget

customer_reviews.title: Best airbrush I have used...highly recommend, A+++++
customer_reviews.text: After buying 2 of the competitor airbrushes and sending them back w/ issues, it was great to get an airbrush of quality construction. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Result on a budget.
customer_reviews.text: Its my first time using an airbrush and i have to tell you that with a little research the results on my first scale model kit was a success. A most for beginners or people looking not to spend hundreds.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Colon

customer_reviews.title: Plastic jars, NOT GLASS
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this about a month ago. The picture is misleading though. Glass jars are shown in the photo, but I received plastic jars. Highly disappointed with that.
customer_reviews.author: Nora maza

customer_reviews.title: The airbrush works fine but realize it's not the set that's pictured or ...
customer_reviews.text: The airbrush works fine but realize it's not the set that's pictured or described. Paasche has combined sizes one and three needles and aircaps into single pieces that you use with the corresponding one, three, or five tip. I tried ordering a replacement and received the same set. I wish there was a way to rate the product and the seller for each product. I'd give the airbrush four stars and Amazon.com one star for this item.
customer_reviews.author: iConsume

customer_reviews.title: My 1st  Airbrush
customer_reviews.text: Haven't Used it yet, but it looks and feels great . This my 1st Airbrush setting up and scratch building / model building station
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Works great and it simple to use. The only problem I had was getting a fitting ($10.00) to match the competitive air compressor I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Sam W. Magruder Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I use this for cars
customer_reviews.text: I use this for touching up paint on cars and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Super great.
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner on airbrushing this air brush is very easy to use used it on my model kit cars very enjoyable highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo verduzco

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Love the NPT Hose Connection
customer_reviews.text: For the price, unbeatable. Note that some people complain about the hose fittings, but these fittings worked perfectly for me. The compressor end is a very standard NPT fitting, which is the most common fitting used by 'real' air compressors. So, it was an effortless connection to my giant shop compressor.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Bellamy

customer_reviews.title: Great Airbrush for car models
customer_reviews.text: No issues. Great 4 car models. Military not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Haraway

customer_reviews.title: awesome for duracoating
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I have nothing bad to say, and american made. Great tool
customer_reviews.author: blaineo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Old but very good design. Very suitable for flat layers of lacquer, primers and paints in general
customer_reviews.author: popa cristian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best deal on this airbrush I could find. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: it was a good investment.
customer_reviews.text: I have a very NASTY paint process and these hold up amazingly well. For the money, it was a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Collins

customer_reviews.title: Paasche Airbrush
customer_reviews.text: When i bought this airbrush i was ready to take that next step in my model building. I have used it 3 times already and the results are above and beyond what i was looking for. Easy to use and easy to maintain. All I can say is OMG !!!!!!!!! Highly recommend this product to ANY hobbyist who is ready to be amazed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: For the beginner this airbrush...Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This airbrush is Awesome! Very user friendly! Clean up is easy and paint mixing ( thining) is not as involved as a duel stage airbrush! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Matteson

customer_reviews.title: great airbrush
customer_reviews.text: I am a taxidermist and this brush works great. I was using an older model double action Paasche airbrush for 15 yrs. I found that this single action one is much easier to use. I wish I had this 15 years ago, I can paint spots on fish much easier and yesterday I used this for the first time to paint a 25" rainbow trout. It came out great. The customer is gonna be happy. It already paid for itself. If I could post a picture of the fish I would.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M

customer_reviews.title: First Airbrush
customer_reviews.text: Its our first airbrush. Very simple to clean and operate. Easily adjustable to apply the thickness desired. Its a great little kit!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hull

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as pictured, and I'm so excited to use it!
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: This is a great air brush for the beginner to moderate user
customer_reviews.text: This is a great air brush for the beginner to moderate user. The kit is all you need to get painting. Easy to adjust clean.
customer_reviews.author: TSA

customer_reviews.title: Single Action Paasche Airbrush
customer_reviews.text: Item was what I expected with no defects and prompt delivery. It was recomended in a wood carving class that I attend.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Paasche H Airbrush
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs - excellent quality! Everything you need to get into the art in kit form.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is just like my old one and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Carey

customer_reviews.title: Spfx MUA
customer_reviews.text: This is my second brand of airbrush and I'm in love! Everything I've ever needed WITHOUT A STUPID NEEDLE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything perfect. Just as expected and advertised. It is the forth Paasche airbrush we used. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Berthet

customer_reviews.title: I've only used it once so far, but it ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once so far, but it seems to work very well. I just have to get used to the different technique required compared to a spray can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I Love the Airbruch, But the free shipping is what sold me.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great general purpose air brush.
customer_reviews.text: Great unit, made air brushing a pleasure again! Old unit was worn out. Simple to use & easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time missing some parts to two of the spray heads other then that it works great
customer_reviews.author: raymond woodring jr

customer_reviews.title: item had all parts and I'm very happy with my new airbrush
customer_reviews.text: Everything was sent and received on time...item had all parts and I'm very happy with my new airbrush...
customer_reviews.author: Eunique Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: Got this for DuraCoat
customer_reviews.text: Had this about a month now used it 3 times with DuraCoat. Easy to use, Hard to clean. I have adjust the tip all the way out to get paint to flow through but DuraCoat is super thick too. This pack comes with great parts the braided hose is a life saver and the quick disconnect bottles are super handy. Ill keep using this brush tell it clogs all the way, then just get one from harbor freight.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best all purpose airbrush. Easy to use and clean. Great for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Faucett

customer_reviews.title: MY DAUGHTER LOVES IT SHE SAID ITS VERY USER FRIENDLY ...
customer_reviews.text: MY DAUGHTER LOVES IT SHE SAID ITS VERY USER FRIENDLY AND SHE WOULDN'T LET ANY BODY BARROW IT ,THEY HAVE TO BUY THERE OWN .LOL FAST DELIVERY TOO THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: Fred  t  Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect starter set. Easy to use, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Schean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great airbrush. Trigger is nice and smooth and it sprays like a dream
customer_reviews.author: A. Pastijn

customer_reviews.title: Paasche H air brush kit
customer_reviews.text: Very Good Air Brush kit very easy to use I use it to paint fishing lures all tips work great. easy to control paint and get coverage you need.
customer_reviews.author: F & ugly Tackle

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality for makeup and my sister ended up returning it for a different that was better quality
customer_reviews.author: Aliesha

customer_reviews.title: Air Brush
customer_reviews.text: First of all I can't rate this with stars because it is not a TOY! It is a professional Air Brush! The air brush works great but it had a defective air line which leaked very bad. The seller handled it wonderfully with no issues. I only needed to put up with the leak about 5 days but it was usable so it was only a minor set back.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C. Linder

customer_reviews.title: worked amazing the first 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: doesn't clean much, after each use I clean it but there is always left over paint and gunk. sprays in bloches and rarely has a clean spray. very inconsistent. waist of money and time. and before anyone calls it user error, pressure is set to correct psi, paint is thinned correctly. it also will stop spraying paint in the middle of my putting coats on. worked amazing the first 2 uses, now its just a pathetic joke of a product.
customer_reviews.author: zachary harris

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter
customer_reviews.text: This is a good starter airbrush, but it started to not work after my third paintjob, dissapointed..so i moved on to an iwita and boy does it kick this airbrush ass
customer_reviews.author: Tony R

customer_reviews.title: Paasche H-airbrush
customer_reviews.text: Now granted I have not gotten to use this yet but I did some research and found this one to be a solid,(USA made) metal bodied value. The accesories are varied and are nice quality with glass jars. From doing T-shirts to painting my rifles I FULLY plan to put the Paasche H through its fullest abilities.
customer_reviews.author: Jack A Voltrade

customer_reviews.title: then I would have been very happy. But unfortunately Amazon
customer_reviews.text: If this item had actually been what I had ordered, and not a different substituted kit, then I would have been very happy. But unfortunately Amazon.com does not seem to be able to effectively send out what is advertized and purchased. When it comes to tools, it is important to sell exactly what you are advertising, not something that is relatively close.
customer_reviews.author: Kris McCanless

customer_reviews.title: Not Clear About What's Included
customer_reviews.text: Did not Know that I would now have to buy an air compressor. Why do I need to say more?
customer_reviews.author: Alvin T. Bolster

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived with pieces missing. Naturally, I returned it, but there was no option for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Tony C.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought one of these and need some parts.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Cárcamo

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a cheap Chinese airbrush I had bought earlier. After wasting a LOT of very expensive CeraKote, I still cannot get it to spray. Operating according to the instructions and adjusting IAW the instructions. Did not work out of the box. POS! I would return if I could, but I've waited too long. POS! I would not buy again nor would I recommend to anyone. Ordering another cheap Chinese airbrush, at least I can throw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Yaron

customer_reviews.title: Works Really Nice
customer_reviews.text: I was worried I would not like, BUT, this Paasche H-Set Single Action works just fine. It is Paasche's inexpensive set, therefore plastic jars come with it (I bought the accessory glass jars with it). After a few times using it. I really like it. Beautiful super fine finished paintjobs on plastic models. I have only used it for Tamiya Acrylic model paints. I had a Badger airbrush years ago and I hated it. I love this one.
customer_reviews.author: Relic 57

customer_reviews.title: Terrible manual with no instructions
customer_reviews.text: This is my first airbrush so I was very disaphimpointed that it didn't come with instructions. The "manual" showed a list of parts but no explanation of how to use them. For example, it came with three different tips which had to be mated with three different holders but there was no explanation about which tip went with which holder. I ended up having to find a YouTube video to explain it. I did some experimenting to figure out how to make adjustments. Once I figured it out, it worked fine, even with ceramics glazes. It wouldn't have taken much for them to include some operating instructions. Hard to believe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great single action brush
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brush after first buying a cheap compressor and brush set but cleaning it became problematic. I bought this brush based on vids on YT and found it to be as promised. A low cost, well built brush. I'd heard people say that you really need a dual action, but for me a single is fine, I just adjust the nozzle. I don't do fine detail work, and I don't particularly like all of the working parts on a DA. I can keep this one clean fairly simply, and the results are great as long as the paint is decent. I almost gave up using an airbrush until I got this one.
customer_reviews.author: D_Ray

customer_reviews.title: You Won't Regret It!
customer_reviews.text: I love this airbrush. I have never had a clog or any other problems with it. I know people that use $300 airbrushes and still own this one to use on a regular basis. It's known among experienced airbrush experts to be the best airbrush for first time users. I would highly recommend it. I purchased the aluminum handle for it and it made it even better, setting off the weight of the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas A.

customer_reviews.title: Order old school  replacement jars etc.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace one I bought in 1977 still works but dropped to many times. Kit was missing some parts also I don't like cheap plastic jars, tops,and paint drawing hoses in jars.my old ones are glass and metal and two sizes.Tools were chrome.New kit no tools. I would have been happy to pay more for the old style kit.
customer_reviews.author: Les Boone

customer_reviews.title: Loving my H
customer_reviews.text: I am fairly new to airbrushing and find the Paashe H perfect for my needs which is model making and some light auto body. Nothing fancy, easy to operate right out of the box and most of all easy to clean, since it is single stage there is no needle or miniature grommets to mess with. Product flow is easily controlled by adjusting the paint discharge port. As I get better maybe I will need more but right now this is my go to gun!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter kit and easy to use for first time person.
customer_reviews.text: This set was a lot cheaper here than the craft stores. It arrived on time and not damaged. I purchased a harbor freight air compressor to use with this set up. Ended up having to purchase a brass reducer (for less than a dollar) so I could connect the harbor freight coil hose to the paasche one. One of "H" needles did have a bit of casting trash but a small file took care of that and works just fine. Very pleased with the performance of this set up and has been trouble free. I use it for my leather working hobby. They also have a practice exercises in the booklet to help you out.
customer_reviews.author: Szyslak

customer_reviews.title: So far everything looks of high quality. A value ...
customer_reviews.text: So far everything looks of high quality. A value (3B) is needed to use this airbrush with an air can. Its available directly from Paasche for less then $10 plus shipping. I was able to buy one at my local train store at the same price as Paasche and avoided shipping charges. I would go with the HS version which has a sold handle, probably balances better. Only $1 or 2 difference in price. Sold handle cost around $10 more separately.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Works for Cerakote!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used this airbrush to apply cerakote c series to a 1911 frame that I was doing. I used the medium sized tip that came with it. I have never picked up an airbrush until this one. It was very easy to use and problem free.
customer_reviews.author: shannon goss

customer_reviews.title: My 13 yr. olds 1st airbrush !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent airbrush for the beginner and advanced modeler ! I have been using a PAASCHE H for close to 30 years now !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Never dissapointed with paasche!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome deal and awesome airbrush! I bought maybe 6 master airbrushs for 30 a piece and they never last long, but paasche is always reliable! Try to grab a used one of you can. The description say "used" but it's more like the box has a rip or a bit of damage, unless you save the box save yourself 10 bucks! Can't say enough!
customer_reviews.author: TheVesselOfZeon

customer_reviews.title: Works well but hard to do detail work-needs a 2 stage
customer_reviews.text: This airbrush works well but a 2 stage would work much better- hard to make fine lines with this kit-
customer_reviews.author: Sawdustmaker

product_meta.title: Paasche Airbrush H-Set Single Action Siphon Feed Airbrush Set
product_meta.description: Number of Items:1The airbrush features a chrome plated body for durability. Included with the airbrush are all three available spray heads, which allow the H airbrush to be used in a wide range of application. The H single action allows the user to achieve fine lines down to 1/16-inch and wider patterns of up to 1-1/2-inch. The H is simple and easy to use and requires very little practice compared to double action models. The best uses are those requiring more basic spraying like solid coats, uniform lines or stencil work. Clean up is as simple as spraying your paint cleaner though the airbrush. The H is used for many applications including hobby, craft, chip and ding repair, taxidermy, ceramics, cake decorating, tanning, tattoos, etc. The H airbrush is made in the US and includes the following: H#3 airbrush, size 1 and 5 spray heads, 1/4-ounce metal cup, 1-ounce bottle assembly, 1-ounce storage bottle, hanger, wrench, 6-foot braided hose, lessons booklet and manual.
feature_bullets: H Airbrush: The H airbrush is perfect for beginners or those requiring quick and easy spraying
Siphon Feed Airbrush: Achieve patterns of 1/16-inch to 1-1/2-inch
Single Action Airbrush: Set includes all three head sizes. Size 1 (.45mm), Size 3 (.65mm), Size 5 (1.05mm)
Airbrush Set: H-SET includes H#3 airbrush, size 1 & 5 spray heads, 1/4 oz metal cup, 1 oz bottle assembly, 1 oz storage bottle, hanger, wrench, 6-foot braided air hose, lessons booklet and manual
Paasche Airbrush: The H airbrush is made in the USA
